items.title: Operator Portal
items.description: Hosted admin panel for a "single pane of glass" business view.

items.title: Customers
items.description: User, Account, Parent Account management w/ standard workflows.

items.title: Staff & Vendors
items.description: A source of truth for RBAC and related workflows.

items.title: Audit Logs
items.description: Unified cross platform event and audit logs.

items.title: Contacts
items.description: Marketing contacts management with dynamic lists and opt-in.

items.title: Entitlements & Quotas
items.description: Management of feature access, quotas and tiering.

items.title: Product Catalog
items.description: Programmable foundation for billing, quoting, feature access.

items.title: Fraud & Abuse
items.description: Basic risk and fraud scoring for user signups.

items.title: Agreements
items.description: Online and offline management of AuP, ToS, MSA, NDA, etc.

items.title: Pricing
items.description: Transparent pricing models tailored for scalability and flexibility.

items.title: Quoting
items.description: Generate and manage quotes for streamlined sales engagements.

items.title: Purchase Orders
items.description: An API to support end user procurement tracking.

items.title: Billing
items.description: Hub for account statements, two sided ledger, and invoice status.

items.title: Order Management
items.description: A workflow for contract and order lifecycling.

items.title: Deal Rooms
items.description: Hosted trust centres for quotes, policies, & agreements.
